title: Pick'Em Rewards
body: So Riot, what if I own all 4 Ultimate skins (Pulsefire Ezreal, Spirit Guard Udyr, DJ Sona, and Elementalist Lux)? What would my reward(s) be?

replies.body:
[**You still get the same rewards**](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#how-to-play). It's actually a cache containing the skin shards, so if you already have them you can disenchant them for essence, which will be the new currency instead of IP after the switch.

https://i.gyazo.com/47877428baca64bcd4cef5731173cedf.png
They would disenchant into orange essence which, as far as we know, is not changing in any way during the transition.
